verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, to bring to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>. O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in thy <S%H7110>wrath<s%>: neither <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in thy hot <S%H2534>displeasure<s%>.
For thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> stick <S%H5181>fast<s%> in me, and thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> presseth me <S%H5181>sore<s%>.

There is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of thine <S%H2195>anger<s%>; neither is there any <S%H7965>rest<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin<s%>. rest: Heb. peace, or, health
For mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are gone <S%H5674>over<s%> mine <S%H7218>head<s%>: as an <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> they are too <S%H3513>heavy<s%> for me.
My <S%H2250>wounds<s%> <S%H887>stink<s%> and are <S%H4743>corrupt<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H200>foolishness<s%>.
I am <S%H5753>troubled<s%>; I am bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> long. troubled: Heb. wried
For my <S%H3689>loins<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H7033>loathsome<s%> disease: and there is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
I am <S%H6313>feeble<s%> and <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H1794>broken<s%>: I have <S%H7580>roared<s%> by reason of the <S%H5100>disquietness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
<S%H136>Lord<s%>, all my <S%H8378>desire<s%> is before thee; and my <S%H585>groaning<s%> is not <S%H5641>hid<s%> from thee.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5503>panteth<s%>, my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5800>faileth<s%> me: as for the <S%H216>light<s%> of mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H1992>it<s%> also is <S%H369>gone<s%> from me. is gone: Heb. is not with me

My <S%H157>lovers<s%> and my <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> aloof <S%H5048>from<s%> my <S%H5061>sore<s%>; and my <S%H7138>kinsmen<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>. sore: Heb. stroke my kinsmen: or, my neighbours

They also that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>life<s%> lay <S%H5367>snares<s%> for me: and they that <S%H1875>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> mischievous <S%H1942>things<s%>, and <S%H1897>imagine<s%> <S%H4820>deceits<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
But I, as a <S%H2795>deaf<s%> man, <S%H8085>heard<s%> not; and I was as a dumb <S%H483>man<s%> that <S%H6605>openeth<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Thus I was as a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> not, and in whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are no <S%H8433>reproofs<s%>.
For in thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, do I <S%H3176>hope<s%>: thou wilt <S%H6030>hear<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>. in: or, thee do I wait for hear: or, answer
For I <S%H559>said<s%>, Hear me, lest otherwise they should <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me: when my <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slippeth<s%>, they <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves against me.
For I am <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H6761>halt<s%>, and my <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> before me. to halt: Heb. for halting
For I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; I will be <S%H1672>sorry<s%> for my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.

But mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H2416>lively<s%>, and they are <S%H6105>strong<s%>: and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied<s%>. are lively: Heb. being living, are strong
They also that <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%> are mine <S%H7853>adversaries<s%>; because I <S%H7291>follow<s%> the thing that <S%H2896>good<s%> is.
<S%H5800>Forsake<s%> me not, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: O my <S%H430>God<s%>, be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from me.
Make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H8668>salvation<s%>. to: Heb. for my help
